p: Water bath (Lab Tech, BPXOP1001040, Namyangju, South Korea), UV-Visible Spectrophotometer (Jenway 7315, Staffordshire, UK), CO 2 incubator (Esco, 2012-74317, Changi, Singapore), microplate reader (Unilab, 6000, Mandaluyong, USA), inverted microscope (MRC, IX73, Hong Kong, China), vortex (Heidolph Company, 090626691, Schwabach, Germany), and microwave-ultrasonic reactor extractor (Lab-Kits UM2015042801A, Hong Kong, China) were used.
